data.name: Codename: Judgement
data.detailed_description: Based on the retro game Speedball, Codename: Judgement is a Cooperative Multiplayer Online Game taking place in a gloomy sci-fi cyberpunk universe where 3 races (Angels, Cyber humans and Demons) are playing the Judgement game - A brutal ball game where, with a team of 3 champions, they have to score in the opponent’s goal. There are no rules! no barriers! And no referees in this bloody sport, which makes the game extremely exciting, intense, and strategy rich. 12 Champions are available, each with unique superpowers and customisable with special items, to optimize your strategy and create your ultimate team.
data.about_the_game: Based on the retro game Speedball, Codename: Judgement is a Cooperative Multiplayer Online Game taking place in a gloomy sci-fi cyberpunk universe where 3 races (Angels, Cyber humans and Demons) are playing the Judgement game - A brutal ball game where, with a team of 3 champions, they have to score in the opponent’s goal. There are no rules! no barriers! And no referees in this bloody sport, which makes the game extremely exciting, intense, and strategy rich. 12 Champions are available, each with unique superpowers and customisable with special items, to optimize your strategy and create your ultimate team.
data.short_description: 3 vs 3 Dark and violent TPS Sport game with ultra-intense and brutal gameplay in a hostile Cyberpunk arena. Co-op, teamplay and champion customization are crucial in order to optimize your strategy and crush the opposition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game happens in a brutal gloomy universe where player can punch, tackle, knock down, kill and execute their opponents in a brutal sport game
